statement:
An important result in the classification of all finite simple groups,
the Feit-Thompson theorem states that every non-Abelian simple group
must have even order.

The only known proof requires 255 pages.

References
==========

Feit, W. and Thompson, J. G., [*Solvability of groups of odd order*]{},
Pacific J. Math. 13 (1963), 775-1029.
